name: Websites
description:
Check whether websites are blocked using OONI's [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Every time you tap Run, you test different websites from the Citizen Lab's [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) and [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) test lists.

To test the sites of your choice, tap the Choose websites button or select categories of sites via the settings of this card. 

This test measures whether websites are blocked by means of DNS tampering, TCP/IP blocking or by a transparent HTTP proxy.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
author: norbel@ooni.org

description_intl.ar:
تأكّدوا عمّا إذا كانت المواقع محجوبة باستخدام [اختبار الاتصاليّة بالويب](https://ooni.io/nettest/web-connectivity) من OONI 

في كل مرّة تنقرون فيها "Run" ستقومون بفحص المواقع الموجودة لدى قائمة اختبارات Citizen Lab [العالميّة](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) و تلك [الخاصّة ببلد معيّنة](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists)

لاختبار مواقع معيّنة، انقروا زر "Choose websites" أو "اختاروا من ضمن تصنيفات المواقع عبر إعدادات هذا الكرت. 

اختيار مواقع" هذا الفحص يكشف عمّا إذا كانت المواقع محجوبة عن طريق التلاعب ب DNS، حجب TCP/IP أو عن طريق بروكسي HTTP غير مرئي.

سيتم نشر نتائج فحصكم على كل من [مكتشف OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org) و [واجهة تطبيق OONI](https://api.ooni.io/)
description_intl.ca:
Check whether websites are blocked using OONI's [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Every time you tap Run, you test different websites from the Citizen Lab's [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) and [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) test lists.

To test the sites of your choice, tap the Choose websites button or select categories of sites via the settings of this card. 

This test measures whether websites are blocked by means of DNS tampering, TCP/IP blocking or by a transparent HTTP proxy.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.de:
Prüfe mit dem [Webverbindungstest](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) von OONI, ob Websites blockiert sind.

Jedes Mal, wenn du auf Ausführen tippst, testest du verschiedene Websites aus den [globalen](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) und [länderspezifischen](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) Testlisten des Citizen Labs.

Um die Websites deiner Wahl zu testen, tippst du auf die Schaltfläche Websites auswählen oder wählst Kategorien von Websites über die Einstellungen dieser Karte aus.

Dieser Test misst, ob Websites durch DNS-Manipulation, TCP/IP-Blockierung oder durch einen transparenten HTTP-Proxy blockiert werden.

Deine Ergebnisse werden auf dem [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) und [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) veröffentlicht.
description_intl.el:
Δες αν έχουν μπλοκαριστεί ιστοσελίδες, χρησιμοποιώντας τη δοκιμή [Web Connectivity](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) του OONI.

Κάθε φορά που πατάς Εκτέλεση, ελέγχεις διαφορετικές ιστοσελίδες από την [παγκόσμια](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) και τις [εθνικές](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) λίστες του Citizen Lab.

Για να ελέγξεις όποιες ιστοσελίδες θες, πάτα το κουμπί "Επέλεξε ιστοσελίδες" ή διάλεξε κατηγορίες ιστοσελιδών μέσω των ρυθμίσεων αυτής της κάρτας.

Αυτή η δοκιμή εξετάζει αν ιστοσελίδες έχουν μπλοκαριστεί μέσω τροποποίησης του DNS, μπλοκάρισμα σε επίπεδο TCP/IP ή μέσω διάφανου HTTP proxy.

Τα αποτελέσματα των δοκιμών σου θα δημοσιευτούν στο [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) και στο [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.es:
Comprobar si los sitios web están bloqueados usando la [prueba conectividad de la Web] de OONI (https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Cada vez que pulsas Ejecutar, pruebas diferentes sitios web incluidos en las listas de pruebas de Citizen Lab [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) y [específicas por país](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists).

Para probar los sitios de tu elección, pulsa el botón Elegir sitios web o selecciona categorías de sitios vía los ajustes de ésta tarjeta.

Esta prueba mide si los sitios web están bloqueados por medio de manipulación de DNS, bloqueo de TCP/IP o por un proxy transparente HTTP.

Tus resultados serán publicados en el [Explorador OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) y la [API OONI](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.fa:
با استفاده از[تست اتصال وب](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) OONI بررسی کنید که آیا وبسایت ها مسدود شده اند یا خیر.

 هر بار که بر روی اجرا می زنید، وبسایت‌های مختلفی از لیست‌های تست [جهانی](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) و [کشوری](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) از Citizen Lab را تست می‌کنید.

برای تست سایت‌‌های انتخابی خودتان، بر روی گزینه‌ی انتخاب وبسایت‌ها بزنید و یا دسته‌بندی سایت‌های مورد تست را در تنظیمات این کارت، انتخاب کنید.

این تست اندازه گیری می کند که سایت‌ها با چه روشی از دستکاری DNS، مسدود شدن TCP/IP و یا به وسیله یک پراکسی شفاف HTTP مسدود شده اند.

نتایج تست های شما بر روی [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) و [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) منتشر خواهند شد.
description_intl.fr:
Vérifiez le blocage des sites Web grâce au [Test de connectivité Web](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) de l’OONI (page en anglais).

Chaque fois que vous touchez Lancer, vous testez différents sites Web provenant des listes de tests [mondiale](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) et [propre à un pays](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) du « Citizen Lab » (site en anglais).

Pour tester les sites de votre choix, touchez le bouton « Choisir des sites Web » ou sélectionnez des catégories de sites dans les paramètres de cette carte. 

Ce test mesure si les sites Web sont bloqués par une manipulation DNS, par un blocage TCP/IP ou par un mandataire HTTP transparent.

Vos résultats seront publiés dans l’[Explorateur OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) et l’[API d’OONI](https://api.ooni.io/) (site en anglais).
description_intl.hi:
OONI के [वेब कनेक्टिविटी परीक्षण](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) का उपयोग करके जांचें कि क्या वेबसाइटों को अवरुद्ध किया गया है।

हर बार जब आप रन पर टैप करते हैं, तो आप सिटीजन लैब की [दुनिया भर](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) की और [देश-विशिष्ट](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) परीक्षण सूचियों से विभिन्न वेबसाइटों का परीक्षण करते हैं।

अपनी पसंद की वेबसाइटों का परीक्षण करने के लिए, इस कार्ड की सेटिंग के माध्यम से वेबसाइट चुनें बटन पर टैप करें या साइटों की श्रेणियों का चयन करें।

यह परीक्षण मापता है अगर वेबसाइटों को DNS छेड़छाड़, टीसीपी/आईपी ब्लॉकिंग या पारदर्शी HTTP प्रॉक्सी द्वारा अवरुद्ध किया गया है या नहीं।

आपके परिणाम [OONI एक्सप्लोरर](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) और [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) पर प्रकाशित किए जाएंगे।
description_intl.id:
Periksa apakah suatu situs web diblokir dengan [Tes Konektivitas Web](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) OONI.

Setiap kali Anda mengetuk Jalankan, Anda mengetes situs web berbeda dari daftar tes [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) dan [khusus-negara](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) Citizen Lab.

Untuk mengetes situs pilihan Anda, ketuk tombol Pilih situs web atau pilih kategori situs melalui pengaturan kartu ini. 

Tes ini mengukur apakah situs web diblokir melalui perusakan DNS, pemblokiran TCP/IP, atau proksi HTTP transparan.

Hasil Anda akan dipublikasikan di [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) dan [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.is:
Athugaðu hvort lokað sé á vefsvæði með því að nota [prófun veftenginga](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) hjá OONI.

Í hvert skipti sem þú ýtir á 'Keyra' muntu prófa þau vefsvæði sem innifalin eru í [almennu](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) og [lands-sértæku](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) prófunarlistunum hjá Citizen Lab.

Til að prófa vefsvæði að eigin vali, skaltu ýta á hnappinn til að velja vefsvæði eða velja flokka vefsvæða í gegnum stillingar þessa spjalds. 

Þetta prófar hvort lokað sé á vefi með því að fikta við DNS, lokun með TCP/IP eða með gegnsæum HTTP-milliþjónum (proxy).

Niðurstöðurnar þínar verða birtar í [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) og [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.it:
Controlla se i siti web sono bloccati usando il [test di Connettività Web](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) di OONI

Ogni volta che fai tap su Run, misurerai diversi siti web dalla [lista globale](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) e [specifica per il paese](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) del Citizen Lab.

Per misurare un sito a tua scelta, fai tap sul bottone Scegli siti o configura le categorie da testare nelle impostazioni di questa card.

Questo test misura se i siti web sono bloccati per mezzo di censura su base DNS, blocco TCP/IP o tramite un proxy HTTP trasparente.

I risultati saranno pubblicati su [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) e [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.nl:
Controleer of websites worden geblokkeerd met behulp van OONI's [Web Connectivity-test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Elke keer dat je op Uitvoeren tikt, test je verschillende websites van Citizen Lab's [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) en [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) testlijsten.

Om de sites van uw keuze te testen, tikt u op de knop Websites kiezen of selecteert u categorieën van sites via de instellingen van deze kaart.

Deze test meet of websites worden geblokkeerd door middel van DNS-manipulatie, TCP/IP-blokkering of door een transparante HTTP-proxy.

Uw resultaten worden gepubliceerd op [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) en [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.pt_BR:
Verifique se os websites estão bloqueados usando o [Teste de Conectividade Web](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) da OONI.

Toda vez que você clica em Executar, você testa diferentes websites das listas de testes [globais](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) e [específicas de cada país](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) do Citizen Lab.

Para testar os sites de sua escolha, toque no botão Escolher sites ou selecione categorias de sites através das configurações deste cartão.

Este teste mede se os sites são bloqueados por meio de manipulação de DNS, bloqueio TCP/IP ou por um proxy HTTP transparente.

Seus resultados serão publicados em [Explorador OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) e [API OONI](https://api.ooni.io/).

description_intl.ru:
Проверьте блокировки сайтов используя OONI [Web Connectivity тест](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Каждый раз нажимая "Старт", вы проверяете набор сайтов из списков тестирования Citizen Lab [глобально](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) и [по конкретным странам](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists).

Чтобы протестировать выбранные сайты, нажмите кнопку «Выбрать» или выберите нужные категории сайтов через настройки на этой карточке.

Этот тест проверяет заблокирован ли сайт через вмешательство в DNS, блокировки TCP/IP или через прозрачный HTTP-прокси.

Результаты будут опубликованы в [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) и [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.sw:
Angalia kama tovuti zimezuiwa kwa kutumia [Kipimo wa Kuunganishaa Wavuti](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity).

Kila unapoboyeza "Anzisha", unajaribu tovuti tofauti kutoka kwa Maabara ya Citizen [ya kimataifa](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-/blob/master/lists/global.csv) na [nchi maalum](https://github.com/citizenlab/test/tree/master/lists) orodha ya mtihani.

Ili kujaribu tovuti za chaguo lako, gusa kitufe cha Chagua tovuti au chagua makundi ya tovuti kupitia mipangilio ya kadi hii. 

Mtihani huu unapima kama tovuti zimefungwa kwa njia ya DNS kutatiza, TCP/IP kuzuiwa au kwa mhimili wa HTTP wazi.

Matokeo yako yatachapishwa kwenye [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) na [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

description_intl.th:
ตรวจสอบว่าเว็บไซต์ถูกปิดกั้นหรือไม่ ด้วย[การทดสอบการเชื่อมต่อเว็บ](https://ooni.io/nettest/web-connectivity/) ของ OONI

ทุกครั้งที่คุณแตะปุ่ม ทดสอบ คุณจะทดสอบเว็บไซต์ที่ต่างกันไปจากรายการทดสอบ[ทั่วโลก](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv)และ[เจาะจงประเทศ](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) ที่จัดทำโดย Citizen Lab

หากต้องการทดสอบเว็บไซต์ที่คุณกำหนดเอง ให้แตะปุ่ม เลือกเว็บไซต์ หรือเลือกหมวดเว็บไซต์ จากการตั้งค่านี้

การทดสอบนี้จะตรวจวัดว่าเว็บไซต์ถูกปิดกั้นหรือไม่ จากวิธีการปลอมแปลง DNS การปิดกั้น TCP/IP หรือการใช้พร็อกซี HTTP แบบล่องหน

ผลทดสอบของคุณจะถูกเผยแพร่บน [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/) และ [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/)
description_intl.tr:
OONI [site bağlantısı sınaması](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) özelliğini kullanarak sitelerin engellenip engellenmediğini denetleyebilirsiniz.

Çalıştır üzerine her tıkladığınızda, Citizen Lab [küresel](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) ve [ülkeye özel](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) sınama listelerindeki çeşitli siteler denetlenir.

Belirli siteleri sınamak için siteleri seçin düğmesine tıklayın ya da bu kartın ayarlarından kategoriyi ya da siteleri seçin. 

Bu sınama sitelerin DNS müdahalesi, TCP/IP engelleme ya da görünmez vekil sunucu ile engellenip engellenmediğini ortaya çıkarır.

Sonuçlarınız [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) ve [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) üzerinde yayınlanır.
description_intl.zh_CN:
使用 OONI 的[网页连通性测试](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/)检查网站是否被屏蔽。

每次您点击“运行”时，都会测试公民实验室的[全球](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv)和[特定国家](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists)列表中的一些网站。

如要测试您自选的网站，点击“选择网站”按钮或通过本卡片的设置选择网站类别。

此测试测量网站是否遭受 DNS 篡改、TCP/IP 封锁或透明 HTTP 代理的屏蔽。

您的测试结果会被发布在 [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) 和 [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/)。
description_intl.zh_TW:
檢查網站是否屏蔽 OONI 之使用 [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

每當點擊執行時，將測試 Citizen Lab 提供的 [全球](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) 與 [特定國家](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) 網站清單。

欲測試所選的網站，請輕觸選取網站按鍵或是透由此卡的設置選取網站類別。

測試會計量網站是否遭 DNS 纂改、 TCP/IP 封鎖或透明的 HTTP 代理等問題

其結果會發佈於[OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) 與 [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/)。
description_intl.my:
OONI ၏ [ဝဘ်ချိတ်ဆက်မှု စမ်းသပ်ခြင်း](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/) ကို အသုံးပြု၍ ဝဘ်ဆိုဒ်များအား ပိတ်ဆို့ထားခြင်းရှိ၊ မရှိ စစ်ဆေးပါ။

စမ်းမည် ခလုတ်ကို နှိပ်တိုင်း Citizen Lab ၏ [ဂလိုဘယ်](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) နှင့် [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) စမ်းသပ်မှု စာရင်းများမှ ကွဲပြားသော ဝဘ်ဆိုဒ်များကို သင် စမ်းသပ်ခြင်း ဖြစ်သည်။

သင်ရွေးချယ်သည့် ဆိုဒ်များကို စမ်းသပ်ရန်၊ ဝဘ်ဆိုဒ်များ ရွေးချယ်မည် ခလုတ်ကို နှိပ်ပါ သို့မဟုတ် ဤကတ်၏ ဆက်တင်များမှ တစ်ဆင့် ဆိုဒ်များ၏ အမျိုးအစားများကို ရွေးချယ်ပါ။

ဤစမ်းသပ်မှုသည် ဝဘ်ဆိုက်များကို DNS ကစားခြင်း၊ TCP/IP ပိတ်ဆို့ခြင်း သို့မဟုတ် ပွင့်လင်းမြင်သာသော HTTP ပရောက်စီ ဖြင့် ပိတ်ဆို့ခြင်း ရှိ၊ မရှိ တိုင်းတာ စစ်ဆေးသည်။
သင့် ရလဒ်များအား [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) နှင့် [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) တွင် ထုတ်ပြန်ပေးပါမည်။
description_intl.vi:
Kiểm tra xem các trang web có bị chặn không bằng cách sử dụng [Kiểm tra Kết nối Web] của OONI (https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Mỗi khi nhấn Chạy, bạn sẽ kiểm tra các trang web khác nhau từ danh sách [toàn cầu] của Citizen Lab (https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) và danh sách  [quốc gia cụ thể] (https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists).

Để chọn trang bạn muốn kiểm tra, hãy nhấn vào nút Chọn trang web hoặc chọn các danh mục trang web ở phần cài đặt.

Kiểm tra này cho biết các trang web có bị chặn bởi các phương thức sửa DNS trái phép, chặn TCP/IP hay bởi một proxy HTTP minh bạch không.

Kết quả của bạn sẽ được công bố trên [OONI Explorer] (https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) và [OONI API] (https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.km:
ពិនិត្យមើលថាតើវែបសាយត្រូវបិទខ្ទប់ដោយប្រើ OONI [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

គ្រប់ពេលអ្នកចុច ដំណើរការ អ្នកនឹងតេស្តវែបសាយនានាពីបញ្ជីរបស់ Citizen Lab [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) and [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists)។

ដើម្បីតេស្តវែបសាយតាមជម្រើសរបស់អ្នក សូមចុចប៊ូតុង ជ្រើសរើសវែបសាយ ឬជ្រើសរើសផ្នែកផ្សេងៗនៃវែបសាយតាមរយៈការកំណត់នៃកាតនេះ។

តេស្តនេះនឹងវាស់វែងថាតើវែបសាយណាដែលត្រូវបិទខ្ទប់ដោយការជ្រៀតចូល DNS ឬការបិទខ្ទប់ TCP/IP ឬតាមរយៈ HTTP Proxy

លទ្ធផលរបស់អ្នកនឹងផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅ [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) និង [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

description_intl.ar:
تحققوا من حجب [Psiphon](https://ooni.io/nettest/psiphon/) و [تور](https://ooni.io/nettest/tor/).

ستنشر نتائج اختبارك على [متصفح OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/) و على [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
description_intl.ca:
Check whether [Psiphon](https://ooni.org/nettest/psiphon/), [Tor](https://ooni.org/nettest/tor/) or [RiseupVPN](https://ooni.org/nettest/riseupvpn/) are blocked.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Deine Ergebnisse werden auf dem [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/) und [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) veröffentlicht.

name: Performance
short_description: Test your network speed and performance
description:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

These tests consume data depending on your network speed.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.

description_intl.ar:
يمكن قياس سرعة و جودة شبكتك من خلال اختبار [NDT](https://ooni.io/nettest/ndt/).

ويمكن قياس أداء بث الفيديو من خلال اختبار [DASH](https://ooni.io/nettest/dash/).

هذه الاختبارات تستهلك بيانات بحسب سرعة اتصالك بالشبكة.

ستنشر نتائج اختبارك على [متصفح OONI](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) و على [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

تنبيه: هذه الاختبارات تعتمد على خوادم من أطراف ثالثة. لذلك لا نستطيع ضمان عدم تسجيل عنوان IP الخاص بك.
description_intl.ca:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

These tests consume data depending on your network speed.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.
description_intl.de:
Miss die Geschwindigkeit und Leistung deines Netzwerks mit dem [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/)-Test.

Miss die Videostreaming-Leistung mit dem [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/)-Test.

Diese Tests verbrauchen Daten in Abhängigkeit von deiner Netzwerkgeschwindigkeit.

Deine Ergebnisse werden auf dem [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) und [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) veröffentlicht.

Haftungsausschluss: Diese Tests verlassen sich auf Server von Drittanbietern. Wir können daher nicht garantieren, dass deine IP-Adresse nicht gesammelt wird.
description_intl.el:
Έλεγξε την ταχύτητα και την απόδοση του δικτύου σου, χρησιμοποιώντας τη δοκιμή [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Μέτρησε την απόδοση ροής βίντεο, χρησιμοποιώντας τη δοκιμή [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Αυτές οι δοκιμές καταναλώνουν δεδομένα ανάλογα με την ταχύτητα του δικτύου σου.

Τα αποτελέσματα των δοκιμών σου θα δημοσιευτούν στο [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) και στο [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Προσοχή: Αυτές οι δοκιμές βασίζονται σε διακομιστές τρίτων. Επομένως, δεν μπορούμε να εγγυηθούμε ότι η διεύθυνση IP σου δε θα συλλεχθεί.
description_intl.es:
Mide la velocidad y rendimiento de tu red usando la prueba [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Mide el rendimiento del streaming de vídeo usando la prueba [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Estas pruebas consumen datos dependiendo de la velocidad de tu red.

Tus resultados serán publicados en el [Explorador OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) y la [API OONI](https://api.ooni.io/).

Descargo: Estas pruebas dependen de servidores de terceros. Por lo tanto, no podemos garantizar que tu dirección IP no será recopilada.
description_intl.fa:
سرعت و کارایی شبکه خود را با استفاده از تست [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) اندازه گیری کنید.

کارایی پخش زنده ویدیویی را با استفاده از تست [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) اندازه گیری کنید.

این تست‌‌ها با توجه به سرعت شبکه‌ی  شما، داده مصرف می‌کنند.

نتایج تست های شما بر روی [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) و [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) منتشر خواهند شد.

سلب مسئولیت: این تست‌ها وابسته به سرورهای ثالث هستند. بنابراین ما نمی توانیم تضمین کنیم که آدرس IP شما جمع آوری نخواهد شد.
description_intl.fr:
Mesurez la vitesse et les performances de votre réseau grâce au test [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) (page en anglais).

Mesurez les performances de la diffusion en continu de vidéos grâce au test [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) (page en anglais).

Ces tests consomment des données selon la vitesse de votre réseau.

Vos résultats seront publiés dans l’[Explorateur OONI](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) et l’[API d’OONI](https://api.ooni.io/) (site en anglais).

Avis : Ces tests reposent sur des serveurs tiers. Nous ne pouvons donc pas garantir que votre adresse IP ne sera pas recueillie.
description_intl.hi:
[NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) परीक्षण का उपयोग कर अपने नेटवर्क की गति और प्रदर्शन को मापें।

[DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) परीक्षण का उपयोग कर वीडियो स्ट्रीमिंग के प्रदर्शन को मापें।

ये परीक्षण आपके नेटवर्क की गति के आधार पर डेटा की खपत करते हैं।

आपके परिणाम [OONI एक्सप्लोरर](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) और [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) पर प्रकाशित किए जाएंगे।

अस्वीकरण: ये परीक्षण तीसरे पक्ष के सर्वर पर निर्भर करते हैं। इसलिए हम गारंटी नहीं दे सकते कि आपका आईपी पता एकत्र नहीं किया जाएगा।
description_intl.id:
Ukur kecepatan dan kinerja jaringan Anda menggunakan tes [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Ukur kinerja aliran video menggunakan tes [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Pengetesan ini menggunakan data tergantung pada kecepatan jaringan Anda.

Hasil Anda akan dipublikasikan di [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) dan [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Penafian: Pengetesan ini bergantung pada peladen pihak ketiga. Oleh karena itu, kami tidak dapat menjamin bahwa alamat IP Anda tidak akan dikumpulkan.
description_intl.is:
Mældu hraða og afköst netkerfisins þíns með [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) prófun.

Mældu afköst myndstreymis með [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) prófun.

Þessar prófanir nota gagnamagn í samræmi við hraða netkerfisins.

Niðurstöðurnar þínar verða birtar í [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) og [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Fyrirvari: Þessar prófanir reiða sig á vefþjóna utanaðkomandi aðila. Við getum því ekki ábyrgst að IP-vistföngum sé ekki safnað.
description_intl.it:
Misura la velocità e le prestazioni della tua rete con il test [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Misura le prestazioni dello streaming video con il test [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Questi test consumano traffico dati in base alla velocità della tua rete.

I risultati dei tuoi test saranno pubblicati su [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) e [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Attenzione: questi test usano server di terze parti. Non possiamo quindi garantire che il vostro indirizzo IP non sarà raccolto.
description_intl.nl:
Meet de snelheid en prestaties van uw netwerk met behulp van de [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Meet de prestaties van videostreaming met behulp van de [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/)-test.

Deze tests verbruiken gegevens, afhankelijk van uw netwerksnelheid.

Uw resultaten worden gepubliceerd op [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) en [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: deze tests zijn afhankelijk van servers van derden. We kunnen daarom niet garanderen dat uw IP-adres niet wordt verzameld.
description_intl.pt_BR:
Meça a velocidade e o desempenho da sua rede usando o teste [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Meça o desempenho da streaming de vídeo usando o [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Esses testes consomem dados dependendo da velocidade da sua rede.

Seus resultados serão publicados no [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) e na [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Isenção de responsabilidade: Esses testes dependem de servidores de terceiros. Portanto, não podemos garantir que seu endereço IP não seja coletado.
description_intl.ro:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

These tests consume data depending on your network speed.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.
description_intl.ru:
Скорость и производительность сети можно измерить с помощью [NDT](https://ooni.io/nettest/ndt/).

Скорость видеопотока — с помощью [DASH](https://ooni.io/nettest/dash/).

Эти тесты обрабатывают данные и зависят от скорости вашей сети.

Результаты будут опубликованы в [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) и [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Внимание: в этих тестах используются серверы третьих сторон. Мы не можем гарантировать конфиденциальность вашего IP-адреса.
description_intl.sw:
Pima kasi na utendaji kazi wa mtandao wako kwa kutumia jaribio la [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Pima utiririshaji wa video ukitumia jaribio la [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Vipimo hivi hutumia data kulingana na kasi ya mtandao wako.

Matokeo yako yatachapishwa kwenye [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) na [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Kanusho: Majaribio haya yanategemea seva za mtu mwingine. Kwa hivyo hatuwezi kuhakikisha kuwa anwani yako ya IP haitakusanywa.
description_intl.sk:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

These tests consume data depending on your network speed.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.
description_intl.sq:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.
description_intl.th:
ตรวจวัดความเร็วและประสิทธิภาพของเครือข่ายของคุณ ด้วยการทดสอบ [NDT](https://ooni.io/nettest/ndt/)

ตรวจวัดประสิทธิภาพในการสตรีมวิดีโอ ด้วยการทดสอบ [DASH](https://ooni.io/nettest/dash/)

การทดสอบเหล่านี้กินจำนวนการใช้ข้อมูล ขึ้นกับความเร็วเครือข่ายของคุณ

ผลทดสอบของคุณจะถูกเผยแพร่บน [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/) และ [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/)

คำปฏิเสธความรับผิด: การทดสอบเหล่านี้พึ่งพาเซิร์ฟเวอร์ของบุคคลที่สาม ดังนั้นเราจึงไม่สามารถประกันได้ว่าที่อยู่ไอพีของคุณจะไม่ถูกจัดเก็บ
description_intl.tr:
[NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) sınaması ile ağınızın hızını ve başarımını ölçebilirsiniz.

[DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) sınaması ile görüntü akış başarımını ölçebilirsiniz.

Bu sınamalar sırasında ağınızın hızına göre belirlenen miktarda çeşitli veriler aktarılır.

Sonuçlarınız [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) ve [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) üzerinde yayınlanır.

Bildirim: Bu sınamalar üçüncü tarafların sunucuları üzerinden yapılır. Bu nedenle IP adresinizin kaydedilmeyeceğini garanti edemeyiz.
description_intl.zh_CN:
使用 [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) 测试测量你的网络速度和性能。

使用 [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) 测试测量视频流性能。

这些测试消耗的数据取决于你的网络速度。

您的结果将被发布在 [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/)和[OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/)。

免责声明：这些测试依赖于第三方服务器。因此，我们不能保证你的 IP 地址不会被收集。
description_intl.zh_TW:
利用 [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) 測試來衡量網路速度和效能。

用 [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) 測試來了解影片串流的表現。

這些測試會因所在網路速度而消耗數據

測試結果會發佈在 [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) 和 [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

免責聲明: 這些測試是透過第三方伺服器，故我們無法保證你的 IP 地址不被他人收集。
description_intl.my:
[NDT] (https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) စမ်းသပ်မှုကို သုံး၍ သင်၏ကွန်ရက် အမြန်နှုန်းနှင့် စွမ်းဆောင်ရည်ကို တိုင်းတာပါ။

[DASH] (https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) စမ်းသပ်မှုကို သုံး၍ ဗီဒီယိုထုတ်လွှင့်ခြင်း စွမ်းဆောင်ရည်ကို တိုင်းတာပါ။

ဤစစ်ဆေးမှုများသည် သင့်ကွန်ရက် အမြန်နှုန်းပေါ်မူတည်၍ ဒေတာကို အသုံးပြုကြသည်။

သင့် ရလဒ်များအား [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) နှင့် [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/) တွင် ထုတ်ဝေပါမည်။

ငြင်းဆိုချက် - ဤစစ်ဆေးမှုများသည် ပြင်ပ ဆာဗာများပေါ်တွင် အားကိုးပါသည်။ ထို့ကြောင့် သင်၏ IP လိပ်စာကို စုဆောင်းမည်မဟုတ်ကြောင်း ကျွန်ုပ်တို့ အာမ မခံနိုင်ပါ။
description_intl.vi:
Đo tốc độ và hiệu suất mạng của bạn bằng cách sử dụng kiểm tra [NDT] (https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/).

Đo hiệu suất phát trực tuyến video bằng bài kiểm tra [DASH] (https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/).

Các bài kiểm tra này dùng dữ liệu tùy thuộc vào tốc độ mạng của bạn.

Kết quả kiểm tra của bạn sẽ được công bố trên [OONI Explorer] (https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) và [OONI API] (https://api.ooni.io/).

Tuyên bố giới hạn trách nhiệm: Những kiểm tra này dựa trên máy chủ của bên thứ ba. Do đó, chúng tôi không thể đảm bảo rằng địa chỉ IP của bạn sẽ không bị thu thập.
description_intl.km:
វាស់ល្បឿន និងគុណភាពនៃបណ្ដាញរបស់អ្នកដោយប្រើ [NDT](https://ooni.org/nettest/ndt/) test.

វាស់គុណភាពនៃដំណើរការវីដេអូដោយប្រើ [DASH](https://ooni.org/nettest/dash/) test.

តេស្តទាំងនេះប្រើទិន្នន័យដែលពឹងផ្អែកលើល្បឿននៃបណ្ដាញរបស់អ្នក។

លទ្ធផលរបស់អ្នកនឹងផ្សព្វផ្សាយលើ [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

បញ្ជាក់៖ តេស្តទាំងនេះពឹងផ្អែកលើម៉ាសុីនមេរបស់ភាគីទីបី។ ពួកយើងមិនអាចធានាបានថាអាសយដ្ឋាន IP របស់អ្នកនឹងមិនត្រូវបានប្រមូលនោះទេ។
